TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content: HypeShuttle will likely prevail in the race at the end. I have been developing hypeairintakes and hypebojet engines, with the help of a few kerbal scientists, and if the hypebojet space worthy versions to work, we might have a hypeshuttle in speeding ahead of the hypetrain, in orbit. GO HYPESHUTTLE!
The HypeTrain has prevailed for weeks, staying constantly at 40-45 percent. The HypeTrain shall win!
The HypeTrain never ends
i've been on the hypeplane+ for 0.25
Someone needs to make a HypeTrain mod with HypePowered engines, etc
It's the HypeTrain's destiny to win. I saw it in the prophecies.

I wish I could change my vote. I voted plane because I believed that hype-powered flight was the way forward, but I've come to realize that a hypetrain uses hype in a much more efficient manner. (I know hype is a renewable resource, but that doesn't mean we should waste it.) Plus, trains are timeless.

I'd say in order to satisfy everyone, we need a Hypetrain with a detachable shuttle and a plane.

Whatever it is, I am now on board. Just updated my PC to something KSP-worthy (which is already more than enough hype for me).

Hype away!

Maybe we won't need my idea after all!

I have two solutions for the fact that the HypeShuttle is catching up.

1) I propose modifying the HypeTrain's locomotive while in motion. Based on the theory of a track pan (see Track Pan) we place HypeIntakes on the HypeTrain to boost its speed.

2) When a new update arrives at last, everyone seems to notice that the hype disappears from the forums. It does, but Hype does not follow the law of Entropy. I have a massive HypeCollector in my basement, and about 3-4 updates worth of Hype. I was attempting to make a HypeBooster, but will gladly spare the entire collection. I can condense said Hype into a superdense form of HypeCoal, which should increase the Hypetrain's speed by approximately 23.9%

Gregroxmun, I await your confirmation. I'm way in the back if you need me, or my equipment.

I'd say in order to satisfy everyone, we need a Hypetrain with a detachable shuttle and a plane.

Whatever it is, I am now on board. Just updated my PC to something KSP-worthy (which is already more than enough hype for me).

Hype away!

OR sit on top of the carriages flying the hype-shuttle and hypeplane like kites.
We're fast approaching the HypeTrainStationofMaximumHype! I can practically smell it!

QUINTUPLE TRACK DRIFTING!

(The song I watched while drawing this.)

QUINTUPLE TRACK DRIFTING!

http://i.imgur.com/lvmUUJK.jpg

(The song I watched while drawing this.)

Wow you are much better at drawing than I am! My avatar is as good as I get.
Track drifting is becoming like razor blades, just when you think we've hit the limit of what is practical someone adds another blade/track.
Here's a drawing to show what various bits of rolling stock look like. Some coaches may not be here.
So, do we know what time the SquadCast will be?

So, do we know what time the SquadCast will be?

7:30 Eastern Daylight Savings Time (EDT)
And 4:30-5:30 PST, here in Washington. Means I'll have to jog home from my after school symphony to make it on time!
Or midnight-ish in the UK! :-)

7:30 Eastern Daylight Savings Time (EDT)

Excellent, thanks! (my time-zone, conveniently)

the hypeshuttle turbojets failed. I guess i support the hype train now...

i need a ticket, gregox!
